Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with In-house Movies, Radio, Direct dial phone, Central Heating, Writing Desk. Internet Access, Copywrite, Fax, Meeting Room.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: On the coast of the Corinthian Gulf and by the green slopes of the Panachaicon Mountain, Port of Patra - 15km, Rio - 5km, Patra - 15km. Nearest Airport: Araxos Apt - 45km.
